data.text:
L'Auberge de Langenthal

Langenthal

This 19th-century mansion is set in a large garden in Langenthal, a 5-minute walk from the train station. It offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi, and a restaurant serving creative cuisine... view morefrom

CHF 125Hotel Bären Langenthal

Langenthal

A traditional wooden building from the 17th century, Hotel Bären is centrally located in Langenthal. It houses an elegant restaurant with Swiss and Mediterranean cuisine. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout... view morefrom

CHF 132Hotel Langenthal

Langenthal

Located in Langenthal in the Canton of Bern, Hotel Langenthal offers free Wi-Fi access. Each room has a balcony, a modern bathroom, and a plasma TV. The restaurant serves Indian and Italian cuisine... view morefrom

CHF 99Parkhotel Langenthal

Langenthal

Parkhotel Langenthal is set in the centre of Langenthal and offers a charming restaurant and a sunny terrace. All rooms are bright and have a private bathroom and a TV... view morefrom

CHF 140Wellness-Kneipp-Park

Obersteckholz

In a renovated farmhouse in quiet surroundings, Wellness-Kneipp-Park offers a spa and wellness centre and a terrace with garden views. Free Wi-Fi and free parking is provided... view morefrom
